text.text: This is the initial release of the **DY Crane Safety Management developer toolkit**. The primary focus of this release was to build a comprehensive, interactive test client to serve as a living developer guide for the backend API and business workflow.

*Developer Guide Test Client (`/test-client`)*
 A new, three-panel UI inspired by modern developer tools, featuring a workflow rail, a detailed step panel, and a real-time log console.

*Server State Reset Functionality*
 A new API endpoint (`POST /api/health/reset-transactional`) and UI button to clear transactional data, enabling robust, repeatable testing.

This release includes the resolution of a complex series of interconnected bugs:
‚Ä¢ *Blank Page on Load*: Fixed a circular dependency.
‚Ä¢ *404 Not Found*: Corrected an incorrect API call.
‚Ä¢ *409 Conflict*: Implemented the server state reset feature.
‚Ä¢ *400/422 Errors*: Solved multiple subtle data type and workflow sequence issues.
For full details, please visit the project repository.
